domain
Class ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator

java.lang.Object
  domain.ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator
Enclosing class:
ImagesManager
protected class ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator
extends java.lang.Object

This nested class is the responsible of managing the image sequences.

Constructor Detail

ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator

protected ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator(Sprite sprite,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> images,
                                       int animationPeriod,
                                       double sequenceDuration,
                                       boolean isRepeating)
This constructor initializes all the ImagesAnimator fields with the passed values and calculates the showPeriod.

Parameters:
sprite - The Sprite asking for the ImagesAnimator instance
name - The current ImagesAnimator name
images - The ArrayListof BufferedImages to animate
animationPeriod - The period that indicates how often the ImagesAnimator setImage() method will be invoked.
sequenceDuration - The total amount of time that a sequence should take
isRepeating - A boolean value indicating if the ImagesAnimator should restart the sequence when it reaches or passes the end of it.
Method Detail

updateSpriteImage

protected void updateSpriteImage()
This method is the responsible of updating the Sprite image. If its animating the sequence, the animation total time is calculated as here follows

animationTotalTime = (animationTotalTime + animationPeriod) % (long) (1000 * sequenceDuration);


once the total animation time is calcullated then the position is setted like

position = (int) (this.animationTotalTime / this.showPeriod);


finally, the method checks if the ImagesAnimator is at the sequence end. If it is, and it shouldn't repeat the sequence, it's stopped. a call to setSpriteImage() is at last made.

See Also:
stop(), setSpriteImage()

stop

protected void stop()
This method stops the ImagesAnimator.

isAnimationFinished

protected boolean isAnimationFinished()
Returns:
true if the animation sequence has reached or passed the end and is not repeating anymore.

restartAtPosition

protected void restartAtPosition(int position)
This method is used to restart the ImagesAnimator at the given position. The animationTotalTime field will be recalculated and the isAnimating field will be setted to true.

Parameters:
position - The position at wich to restart the ImagesAnimator. If it's out of the ArrayList bounds it will be setted to 0.

resume

protected void resume()
This method resumes the ImagesAnimator by setting the isAnimating value to true

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns:
the ImagesAnimator current name

getCurrentPosition

public int getCurrentPosition()
Returns:
the ImagesAnimator current position
